effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If a friendly Pokémon used fire pledge earlier this turn, all opposing Pokémon will take 1/8 their max HP in damage at the end of every turn for four turns (including this one).

short_effect.sun-moon: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: With Fire Pledge, damages opposing Pokémon for 1/8 their max HP every turn for four turns.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A column of grass hits the target. When used with its water equivalent, its power increases and a vast swamp appears.
